      • fernandoSim

        public static double fernandoSim(double[] a,
                                 double[] b,
                                 double[][] W)
        Parameters:
        a - vector representation of the first sentence.
        b - vector representation of the second sentence.
        W - similarity matrix between words.
        Returns:
        value of Fernando-Stevenson similarity measure.
